CustomField.description: updated formula based on request in NICC-023478. LE 8.14.2017.
CustomField.formula: if(TEXT(Revenue_Category__c) = 'Services' && ffrrtemplate__r.Name = 'Activity - Deliverable' && Product__r.pse__IsServicesProduct__c = TRUE, (Milestone_Revenue_Rollup__c / Contract_Total_Amount__c) * Adjusted_Revenue_Amount__c, Adjusted_Revenue_Amount__c)
CustomField.label: Total Revenue to Recognize
